: ** ğŸ  You arrive at a plain where a single small house stands. As you get closer, you see a man working on an incandescent piece of metal.

ğŸ”¨ Chat with the worker

translations.en: ** | ğŸ”¨ The worker sees you and suggests that you make a sword with him. Enthusiastic about getting a new weapon, you accept. You don't take long to clumsily drop your heavy creation onto your foot. Seriously wounded, you give up the idea of creating your own weapon. ğŸ˜µ !

translations.en: ** | ğŸ›ï¸ The man quickly admits he can't accommodate you for the night, but offers to share his meal with you. You politely refuse and go back on your way.

translations.en: ** | ğŸ›ï¸ The man quickly refuses to share his bed with you but offers to share his dinner with you. Hungry and exhausted, you accept his offer.
